Rare Earth Organic

Organic Food Packaging

Throughout the conceptualization for Rare Earth Organic, I focused on creating a scenic atmosphere, that introduces an engaging old-school, “organic” style, whilst still incorporating a modern aesthetic. The main focus of this design was to create a new line of products, with the intentions of creating an instantly recognizable style, signature to the Rare Earth brand.

The illustrative elements are easily interchangeable and can be used for other products that may be introduced in the future. The farm element creates an engaging, “homey” experience for the consumer, and shows the humbling values that Rare Earth has been providing to consumers for over 60 years. The logo uses the “R” for Rare Earth, and stays true to the brands organic roots by incorporating a subtle leaf within the letter-mark. This logo creates a legible and instantly recognizable icon, scalable to any size.
